Text: Bring a FriendHi We experienced technical problems sending out the emails today The wonders of modern technology Sorry for the inconvenience Here it is again John Bring a friend with you on vacation and build memories to last a lifetime In this weeks email Bring a Friend Sale HOT DEALS from your city Effective Oct Funjet Vacations Travel Tips Hotel and Resort Showcase Find a travel agent Tell a Friend Great travel links BRING A FRIEND SALE Think back over the vacations youve taken The scenery was fantastic The beaches were great What you remember best though are the friends you traveled with and the great times you had together Funjet Vacations Bring a Friend Sale lets you and a friend share great memories for less I remember floating in the Caribbean at sunset basking in the warm water with my friends Kate Brian and Julie The next day we took the boat over to Cozumel I can still see their smiling faces in the sun and spray We went snorkeling together played volleyball went shopping I remember strolling down the Strip in Las Vegas with my friend Dan trying our luck at the casinos cooling off by the pool then going out to dinners and great shows Ive traveled with lots of different friends at different times in my life From Orlando to Cocoa Beach to Miami From San Diego to San Francisco From the mountains of Colorado to excitement of Hollywood and LA And every time I was glad there was someone to share the moment with me Funjet Vacations can take you to all these great places Bring a friend and make your vacation ever more special Visit hotdealsindexhtm today Have fun on vacation John Your Friend in Travel at Funjet Vacations Find HOT DEALS From Your City Effective OCTOBER Allinclusive st Person nd Person CANCUN from HOUSTON Nights Cancun Palace Allinclusive You Friend System aver price valid for night vacations departing Thu Nov Dec in Z class of service via Allegro Airlines charter air Price reflects Bring a Friend savings COZUMEL from HOUSTON Nights Iberostar Cozumel Allinclusive You Friend System ave price valid for night vacations departing Daily Jan Feb in Q class of service via Continental Airlines scheduled air LAS VEGAS HOTELONLY Nights Stratosphere Tower Hotel Casino Price valid for night hotelonly vacations arriving SunWed Price is per person based on double occupancy Visit HOT DEALS at hotdealsindexhtm for even more great prices Check back every week for the latest deals FUNJET VACATIONS TRAVEL TIPS Here are Ways to Guarantee Yourself a Great Vacation Book early Prices are great right now and vacations are selling fast The earlier you book the greater your choice of travel dates flights and available resorts Lock in your travel plans now and guarantee yourself a warm winter staying at your favorite hotel or resort Call Funjet Vacations Hour Travel Assistance Center if you have questions or need assistance during your vacation The Hour Customer Assistance Center phone number for your vacation destination is listed on your travel documents Call us day or night Were here for you while youre on vacation Get Complete Vacation Coverage Purchase our Complete Vacation Coverage travel protection and enjoy complete peace of mind If your plans change before you travel and you need to cancel or an emergency situation arises during your vacation youll be covered Plus youll receive our Best Price Guarantee If Funjet Vacations advertised price for your exact vacation decreases after you book youll get the lower price Visit specialsprotecthtm Contact our Destination Service Team Funjet Vacations offers skilled destination service representatives in our major vacation destinations They can assist you with hotel room changes destination information and more Their goal is to make sure you are completely satisfied with your vacation Bring a Friend Travel with a friend and have twice as much fun on vacation Better still Funjet Vacations is offering great Bring a Friend savings right now Visit Hot Deals at hotdealsindexhtm to find Bring a Friend deals to your favorite vacation destinations Pay in full and save Right now Funjet Vacations is offering our Full Payment Discount when you book with your travel agent Pay your travel agent in full at the time of booking and receive a per person discount on domestic travel and a per person savings on international travel Follow these tips and have a great vacation HOTEL RESORT SHOWCASE Check out these great hotels and resorts To book a vacation staying at a featured hotel or resort contact your travel agent or visit planindexhtm friends and family and help share the fun If you received this email from a friend sign up to receive our email specials for yourself at guestindexhtm GREAT TRAVEL LINKS See our full range of choices SAVE per couple to Hawaiis Big IslandAloha There has never been a better time to book your Hawaiian vacation Why Because youll SAVE per couple to Hawaiis Big Island in addition to our already great prices HAWAIIS BIG ISLAND The Big Island has of the world climatic regions making it the most diverse Hawaiian island and offering something for everyone visit the orchid gardens and hike through the tropical rain forest on the eastern side of the island visit historical sites and experience fantastic snorkeling on the western side of the island relax at the sunny beach resorts on the northern part of the island dont miss the Volcano National Park and macadamia nut farms on the southern end of the island golf at some of the most incredible courses in the world The Big Island must sees Waipio Valley once the home of kings of old Hawaii Rainbow Falls one of the Big Islands loveliest waterfalls Black Sand Beaches made up of pulverized lava located on the southeastern cliff White Sand Beaches Hapuna State Beach Park Anaehoomalu Beach and Magic Sands Beach Kailua Volcanoes National Park the number one visitor attraction in the state is also home to Kilauea Volcano the worlds most active volcano which continues to pour into the ocean making the Big Island even bigger each day Be sure to take advantage of the fantastic tours available Dan McSweeneys Whale Watching Island Breeze Luau Fluming the Ditch kayak trip Captain Beans Dinner Cruise Deluxe Morning Luncheon Cruise And dont forget about your Dollar rental car to truly discover the Big Island Youve been waiting all year long for a sale like this so book now before its too late Here are the details on how to save per couple when vacationing to the Big Island Must book by Valid for bulk airhotel vacations not valid for hotelonly vacation aircar vacations or published airfare vacations Valid for all scheduled airlines offered by Funjet Vacations to Hawaii including United Airlines American Airlines Continental Airlines Delta Air Lines and Hawaiian Airlines Valid for all hotels on the Big Island Valid from origins nationwide Discount is per adult ages and older and must be booked through a travel agents electronic booking system or online To book a vacation on the Big Island we recommend you contact your preferred travel agent or visit planindexhtm Mahalo Kate If you would like to unsubscribe to the email specials list please visit unsubhtm OT CTENRONCOM

Great DealsHi there Trying to decide where to go on your next vacation So am I Right now there are great deals everywhere Florida Mexico the Caribbean Las Vegas Hawaii California All your favorite destinations Now that the cold weather is on its way there were actually some snow flakes up north Im starting to remember how it was last Winter Wherever I decide to go its going to be somewhere WARM Sunny days warm nights moonlight walks good times With prices so low its the perfect time to make your vacation plans See the sun have some excitement travel with your family and friends Its always a good time to travel And whenever you travel you always have a good time Have fun on vacation John Your Friend in Travel at Funjet Vacations HOUSTON to CANCUN Nights Flamingo Cancun Resort Plaza Kauai Hawaiis Island of DiscoveryAloha Have you started wearing a coat to work Are you warming up your car each morning Have you put an extra blanket on your bed Thats right winter is hereand you deserve a vacation Take off to Kauai and leave work and the cold behind you Why Kauai Readers of two leading travel magazines have rated Kauai among the top islands in the world Travel Leisure Magazine readers named Kauai on its top ten list and Conde Nast Traveler readers voted Kauai in its Worlds Best Awards Kauai Hawaiis island of discovery offers a slower pace and is lush with the life forces of waterfalls and greenery The Garden Isle of Kauai is the oldest in the chain of Hawaiian islands and the birthplace of the sacred dance of hula Movies filmed on Kauai include Jurassic Park South Pacific and Six Days Seven Nights Convenient air serviceincluding nonstop flights from Los Angeles and San Francisco via United Airlines And be sure to take advantage of the fantastic tours available Half Day Na Pali Snorkel Tour Embark on a snorkeling and whale watching adventure on hardbottom rafts View waterfalls sea caves and get up close and personal with Kauais marine life seasonal availability Na Pali Catamaran Day Tour Venture on Lady Luck a foot deluxe catamaran for a memorable journey along Kauais majestic Na Pali coast Golden Eagle Flights Discover the mysteries of Waimea Canyon named the Grand Canyon of the Pacific by Mark Twain Behold magnificent sea cliffs waterfalls deserted beaches and the infamous Na Pali coast Youve been waiting all year long to vacation to an island this beautiful Purchase your trip today You deserve it For Kauai hotel choices visit destinhawaiilihhotelhtm For reservations contact your preferred travel agent or visit planindexhtm Mahalo Kate If you would like to unsubscribe to the email specials list please visit unsubhtm OT CTENRONCOM
